productBaseInfoV1.title: Lenovo Yoga 3 8-inch (1 GB RAM) 16 GB 8 inch with Wi-Fi+4G
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: This laptop from Lenovo is versatile and can be used in four different ways. You can hang it on a nail, make it stand on a table, hold it with a comfortable grip or place it on a table with a slight tilt. So, you can use it to enjoy a variety of activities from watching movies to reading a book to browsing the net to playing games. The tablet has an immersive audio with the Dolby Atmos sound, making your movies and games more enjoyable.
